actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the regulation of mining activity within, and to repeal the application of the mining laws to areas of the national park system.

summary.text: Provides for the regulation of mining activity within, and repeals the application of the mining laws to areas of, the National Park System. Authorizes appropriations of sums necessary to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the regulation of mining activity within, and to repeal the application of the mining laws to areas of the national park system.
